Perfect for my secret pocket items

Bad quality the zip is broken after normal use

Seriously. It holds everything i throw in it, AND IT STILL STAYS SLIM AND LOW PROFILE. I use it mainly when i go to the gym.. i put my iPhone in it (iPhone 13 pro), my AirPods Pro. My car keys, my vape, my gym gloves, a pack of gums, money, hair band, and sometimes Apple Watch. All that, and there’s still room in it for more stuff. And the best part is that it stays slim and very low profile. The zipper never lagged and never stopped in the middle. It is stretchy and so comfortable to wear. The latch makes it super easy to put on and remove. Every time i wear it i laugh with my partner about it like how does such a bag with such material and features only costs 18 dirhams. It is really unbelievable lol
Super sleek and fits my phone and a few other things
Loved it.. light and waterproof

It’s very light and fits my iPhone Pro Max. It also has a small pocket inside for keys to prevent them from scratching your mobile screen. It’s comfortable to use for running and feels like you're not wearing it.

reviews.review_title: They are quite lightweight but spacious enough to hold all your essentials while running or cycling.
reviews.review_text: I purchased two of these bags; one for myself and one for my boyfriend. They are quite lightweight but spacious enough to hold all your essentials while running or cycling. The bag can hold a phone, cards, keys, small headphones, and more. The pink bag is quite pink, maybe even more than I expected, but it still looks really cool.

very good product .

I need padded workout gloves due to plaque psoriasis on my palms and early Dupuytren’s (fun!).  I’ve tried several options, but like the gel cushioning on these the best.  It has held up to very consistent use (5 hours a week for several months) with no loss of padding.  I also like the finger coverage—it’s high enough but still allows for good range of motion.  The fabric is nice and the Velcro is holding up well.  Would definitely recommend and I will repurchase.
Fürs Training sehr gut geeignet! An den Handflächen etwas steif aber sonst alles gut!

I've been weight training for a couple of years now and I thought that I would replace my existing pair with that slightly better higher quality pair of gloves. Based on the fitment guide, I ordered a pair of medium gloves and unfortunately these are somewhat on the snug side I don't have particularly large hands so this was a bit surprising. The gloves appeared to be very well made with a reasonable amount of wrist support but these are clearly not specifically designed for wrist support. If you get the right size you'll find that these are actually pretty comfy and well made pair of gloves.

These workout gloves from Stealth Sports are build really well.  I ordered them for strengthening an injured shoulder and the pull-up bars were hurting my hands so much that I couldn't concentrate on anything but the pain in my hands.  These gloves were a great help with that.  However, it only seemed to transfer the pain in my hands to the unprotected areas of my fingers. For any other type of activity, these were great.  Dumbbell, barbell, etc. were all fine.  The fit is tight, however, so if you have wide palms you may want to size up.  I rate these a solid 4 stars and would recommend them for their design, quality, and effectiveness.  They are just not what I hoped for pull-ups.

These Stealth Sports Weightlifting Workout Gloves are fantastic! They offer excellent support and comfort during heavy lifts and intense workouts. The gel-padded grip provides superior protection for your palms, preventing calluses and blisters while ensuring a non-slip grip during pull-ups, deadlifts, or any gym training. The fit is snug yet breathable, allowing for maximum flexibility without sacrificing protection. Whether you're into bodybuilding, weightlifting, or general fitness, these gloves are a must-have. They’re durable, stylish, and deliver on their promises, making them a great investment for anyone serious about their workout routine!

This is my first time getting gloves specifically for working out. I really like how lightweight and flexible these gloves are. They have a set of pads on the palm and across the fingers that are protective while also providing grip that doesn't slip. I also like that the finger holes do not squeeze my fingers or feel uncomfortable. They also extend down just over the wrist to provide some support and stability. The large velcro and elastic wrist band make them easy to put on and take off. Similarly, there are small pockets on the back of two fingers which also help with getting the gloves off. I ordered the Large gloves because the circumference of my palm was right at 22 cm. I almost ordered XL but glad I didn't because the Large is a very good fit for my hands, not loose at all and not too tight either (see photos). In comparison, I have a similar pair of gloves for bike riding, but I did not find them to be good for working out in the gym. My biking gloves have much more padding in the palms and have a suede like leather covering which does not provide a good grip on metal bars (but are very comfortable and grip well on my bike handlebar grips).  My biking gloves also do not have the little finger pockets for helping remove them, but wish they did now that I've experienced how much the do help.

These are very protective gloves. The fit is perfect for me, I usually wear a small in gloves. The palm protection is strong and I have no doubt will prevent callouses and improve grip. Removing is made easier with loops on two middle fingers. The wrist support is ideal for me. I don't care for gloves that wrap around multiple times. These velcro once but have a thicker support band on the wrist so it's the best of both worlds. Highly recommend.
The gloves are quite well built. I ordered as per their measurements and they fit a bit snug for me. The palm facing side has nice gel pads for cushioning and they work quite well indeed.

These are good gloves with a solid grip. If I had a concern it would be the big wrist section. It was hard to wear my watch with these on. So I took it off, not a problem. Some folks like the big wrists for a little more support. Just something to keep in mind if you wear a fitness watch. I really like these gloves.
No problems with these simple low cost workout gloves

reviews.review_title: L fits almost like a M; otherwise seems like a quality product.
reviews.review_text: For over 35 years, I've used size L gloves for multiple sports and for weights. These fit almost like M size gloves. They limit hand movement, pulling tightly on fingers and palms and putting downward pressure between the fingers. They may eventually loosen with use - or, not. Have only used them for 2 sessions. As material and padding are thicker than with most gloves, there's a feeling of greater strength and durability. The wrist strap doesn't provide any wrist support - it just serves to close and secure the glove. There's a bit of odor which will hopefully fade with time. The thicker padding is more protective and easier on the hands. However, the smaller size makes the glove uncomfortable to use or even wear. A shame these have a sizing/tailoring issue. Seems to be a qualtiy product. Deducted one star for the small size. These are the smallest pair of size L gloves I've ever owned. Deducted two more stars for how uncomfortable they are in use. These will go into storage until they can be donated.
Very good grip and protection against blisters and hard skin. I don’t have the biggest hands but ordered the large size and they fit perfectly. Definitely recommend

These fit a little snug but after a couple uses they seem to be fitting better. I like the pull tabs to help remove the gloves after exercising. The pads feel good when lifting and should help keep the calluses away. For the price they are pretty decent workout gloves. Hoping they will last a while, but only time will tell. For now, I do like these more than the pair I was using.

reviews.review_title: Takes some time to adjust to your head
reviews.review_text: I found the headband very tight and constricting straight out the packaging. It took a few uses for it to stretch out to a more comfortable fit. I played soccer matches under hot conditions and the sweatband was able to absorb all the sweat at the top of my head. I was able to throw it in the washer and it came out with no damage. Great product at this price!

Somehow (I still don't believe it) I hit the gym at least five times a week. I am a sweater. If it wasn't a sign I'm putting in the work it could be embarrassing sometimes. Yup, that bad. A headband is essential. This line of UA bands have been my daily driver for the last year. Because I'm a consumer and I can't help it, I've tried more than a few others even though I've been satisfied with UA. These absorb the most sweat, don't squeeze me too tight, and hold up remarkably well. I wash them off and squeeze them dry after every workout. The bands have hardly even faded in color. Compared to the more premium varieties, which are generally wider, but thinner and made out of a material similar to athletic compression shirts -- These hold more sweat, don't slide at all, and retain their shape and color better. For reference for fit I have a big head and fine thick hair I keep fairly long. Gray is my favorite color, but red looks great too. I'd like to see some patterns and what not.
Fascia comoda assolutamente adatta al tennis e calcio
Soaks up sweat
Bought these for my son because he sweats when he balls… Now he looks cool.
Bought this for my teenager. He likes it and it works great. The only thing is it was a little more snug to his head. My advice is if you have a big head, expect this to be kinda snug on your head.
Uzun zamandır kullanılıyor deforme olmadı
These are better at holding form than the Adidas ones but I wish there were more colors
Well made. Snug fit on my 6 year old daughter.
Just a basic headband, but name brand and the best price! Got what I ordered.
Great headband for costume Character work or workouts.

reviews.review_title: Makes me look cool as hell!
reviews.review_text: Love it! Love the vibe! Keeps my hair back!

I was expecting good things given the brand, but I've had better, cheaper, sweatbands. This one is just too narrow, it doesn't give enough coverage. The material is also very thick, which should help absorbency but just seems to add to overheating problems in the first place.
It does what it says on the tin. Keeps the sweat off my face and looks good while doing it. It is snug so be warned it will be tight at first.

reviews.review_title: These absorb very well and dries quickly after washing.
reviews.review_text: I was very happy with this headband because it absorbs and evaporates sweat before it stings your eyes!! It really helped with my eye fatigue and salt that was burning and causing halos when I looked at light at night.  This product from under armor seems to be softer and more absorbent than similar brands, therefore I can use it the whole day before rinsing and drying Overnite and doing it all over again.
my son likes it

reviews.review_title: Great for my big-headed ladies! TRUST ME!
reviews.review_text: As a female with a larger than average sized head, I have trouble finding a headband that doesn’t hurt above my ears, give me a headache, or when trying to wear an elastic headband...they just pop right off my head altogether. So I decided to try some men’s performance headbands and these made by Under Armour are great! I have one in black and one in red and I wear them as a normal elastic headband and they do not pop off my head, not even after working 12 hour shifts in a very busy emergency room. They are also hand washable, which is a definite plus for me. I highly recommend these to my fellow large-headed sisters and I will be buying more for myself in other colors.
Although it says one size in the description. Please be aware that it’s very very tight. It’ll work for kids or very small head.
Purchased this as spirit wear for camp. Good quality and stretchy enough to fit a large teenager.
Articolo conforme alla descrizione

My daughter is pre competition and she spends a lot of time in and out of the gym on the bars. Her hands are really sensitive so one of her coaches recommended these. I love that they are pink, since that is her favorite color. I just measured her hands using the sizing guide and they fit perfectly. She loves wearing the sweat bands that came with it all the time too. Very high quality especially for how affordable they were. I will buy this again when her hands grow!

These was purchased for my daughter to go with her gymnastics bar for Christmas. Helps to stop blisters on her hands and also supports her wrist. Great item and my daughter is happy no more sore hands.

This is my second pair of these gloves. I loved the first pair so much I bought a second pair. Easy to wash in the washing machine. A cosy fit for first couple of uses, but they fit well after being used 3-4 times.  I purchased a small size.

These are the best gym gloves I’ve ever owned & used in the gym coz they have lasted me for over a year coz of the fit, padding, & protection on these & a nice, decent wrist strap on them, while other gloves lasted me a couple of month's. Plus I recently ordered a second pair coz they’re soo comfortable to wear in the gym. My first pair were starting wear slowly on both parts of the gloves, but still effective & still could use them until it was time to replace them with a new pair. I highly recommends these gloves if you starting working out in a gym..

Die Handschuhe sind gut verarbeitet, die Qualität ist besser als ich sie bei weit teureren gewohnt bin... Würde ich mir wieder kaufen. Wenn du wirklich große Hände hast nimm XL, L ist dir dann zu eng.

größe L ist für eine normale, eher schlanke männerhand, deutlich zu klein. xl gibts nicht in blau. passt gerade so. noch nicht im training benutzt. Nachtrag Rückgabe...ohne Probleme. Ich habe XL in weiß ergattern können. passt besser. ist aber nichts für eine wuchtige gewichtheberhand.

So disappointed with this purchase now. Just got them and went to try them on and they must not understand sizing. These gloves must be sized for women cause a large for me is a tad big and a medium is to small. I can't even get them over my fingers.
Only used twice since getting them the other day, will  be using three times a week regularly, so far very comfortable and good fit. Nice padding on palm and wrist support.

I have pretty small hands, but these fit perfectly. The wrist support is excellent which was my main reason for buying them as I feel my wrist strength hinders any overhead weight stuff. The grip is good and I generally have nothing bad to say. Also helping prevent callouses!
